snippet.title: Fright Knight Legend - Game Trailer v1 - 30 sec
snippet.description:
Fright Knight Legend is an action packed beat 'em up adventure where you embark on a journey to save the cursed Kingdom of Brightmore. As you fight your way through the hordes of enemies and avoiding traps along the way to find the gems scattered throughout the land, while the Wizard narrates the legendary story.

The 1st official game trailer for Fright Knight Legend scheduled to arrive on Steam Nov 23rd, 2022. This version is 30 seconds long.

Add to your wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2140180/Fright_Knight_Legend/

Signup to play the beta: https://forms.gle/HzMK6byrkRtiBL9H6

The Fright Knight Legend Website: http://frightknightlegend.com

About LunarEx Games:
Since 2013 LunarEx Games has been making app/games for iOS and Android, mainly focusing on Augmented Reality Apps for mobile. In 2022, LunarEx Games will be releasing it’s first game for the PC platform, which spent 2 years in development. 

Learn more about LunarEx Games at http://lunarexgames.com
